page.title: 19COMMUNICATION
page.content: YEARS AGO IN THIS AREA ALL KNOWLEDGE WAS SPREAD BY SPEAKING,TO ONE OR TWO OR AT PUBLIC MEETINGS.THIS STILL TAKES PLACE.TODAY PEOPLE ALSO WRITE AND RECEIVE LETTERS.NATIONAL AND LOCAL NEWSPAPERS AND MAGAZINES ARE BOUGHT. THE LATEST ADDITION HAVE BEEN FREE ADVERTISING NEWSPAPERS.MOST PEOPLE NOW HAVE TELEPHONES AND A NEW AUTOMATIC EXCHANGE HAS OPENED IN STURMINSTER MARSHALL.MOST PEOPLE HAVE RADIOS IN THEIR HOMES,SOME IN THEIR CARS.A FEW PEOPLE HAVE TRANSMITTING SETS AND MORE AND MORE ARE BUYING CITIZENS BAND RADIOS.ALMOST EVERY HOME HAS AT LEAST ONE TELEVISION.HOWEVER,THE NEWEST FORM OF COMMUNICATION IS THE COMPUTER. FACTORIES,OFFICES,SHOPS AND SCHOOLS ALL USE COMPUTERS AND MANY HOMES HAVE THEM.
